comments.comment: honestly that 25 year old man pretending to be 13 and saying mommy and daddy was freaking me out

My favorite is when these people say "I cant believe this is happening to me" as if it isnt 100% their own fault
"you know what? I dont want this cookie" then stumbling when he gets out made me laugh too much
I think the scariest "to catch a predator" moment was the guy who wouldn't get out of his car and the police found rope, a gun, and ducktape in his trunk.
There are SO many TCAP videos online. I binged most of them. It is so unbelievably satisfying watching these creeps get embarrassed and then get arrested.
In the wise words of Jacksepyiceye "It's very easy to not be a sexual predator"

The last guy was so weird. He seemed normal, and he knew what was up at the end. You can really never know who is a predator

It’s so weird for each predator to sorta regress into acting like a child themselves. It makes it even more uncomfortable, considering that they may justify any act since they feel like one, when that couldn’t be farther from the truth.
It's even more disturbing when the predators reveal they have kids at home themselves.
I love the montage of when they are hiding the cameras and they literally put one in a trash bin and close the lid.

Pewds your reaction videos are consistently entertaining! My 43 year old dad will walk in the living room, see me watching your vid, and say “omg I already watched this it was so _____”. He’ll then proceed to sit down and rewatch it with me in the living room.

I found out an adult man who was my age and I knew of was messaging my underage sister and her friend inappropriately, I decided to go chris hansen and posed as a 13 year old to message him and got him charged  turned out he had been inappropriate towards multiple underage people for years

these predators really piss me off and get under my skin. my sister when she was 13 years old, got messaged by a guy name michael. at the time i was 16. she would tell me ab michael and how he was 16 like me. i didn’t think much of it at the time. they talked more and he started being more sexual. obviously uncomfortable with all of it my sister stopped talking to him and i thought that was the end of it. fast forward a few weeks and he’s back. he started talking to her again and he sent her a picture of his dog. my sister replied something like cute dog and he goes “you can come see him if you want.” i grabbed her phone and blocked him bc i knew what would happen next. and i didn’t want her to go through that and i should t have to worry about something like that. this is the kind of shit we have to deal with in todays world. it makes me sick. like a 47 year old man flirting and sending sexual pictures to a minor. who wake up and decides “you know i think i want to have sex with a 13 year old today.” this is so sick and absurd. we need more people to catch these predators and put them in their place. because it sure isn’t here.

When I was 16, a man reached out to me through Snapchat & invited me to his apartment for his birthday party. He picked me up after my shift at Walmart because I didn’t have a license yet. When we got to his place, his "friends" weren’t there. 

I just turned 19 & I want to tell any young girls out there. Be careful. This is very real.
